principal.title: The Pokemon APP
principal.description: A modern web application built with Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and PokéAPI that allows users to search and explore detailed Pokémon information in real-time. Features include dynamic Pokémon detail pages, search with live filtering, and a chat feature that lets users 'talk' to their favorite Pokémon. Deployed on a Google Cloud VM with NGINX.
